amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 111-126 to express the sense of Congress that FAA whistleblowers be granted the full protection of the law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 0 (Roll no. 288).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Burgess.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 0 (Roll no. 288).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
